definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: The Jordache garage was on the outskirts of town, so they got a lot of transient traffic.
sentences.chinese: 乔达虚汽车修理厂位于市郊，那里过往车辆很多。

sentences.english: He founded in 1998 Xiaodian District essence auto repair shop.
sentences.chinese: 他于1998年创立小店区精华汽车修理厂。

sentences.english: I want to transfer the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我想转让这个汽车修理厂。

sentences.english: Garages should be far from the downtown.
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂应该远离市区。

sentences.english: I must look into the garage on the way home to book a service for the car.
sentences.chinese: 回家时我得顺路到汽车修理厂去预约检修汽车的事情。

sentences.english: We still owe the garage for those repairs.
sentences.chinese: 我们还欠汽车修理厂的修理费。

sentences.english: When the two men arrived at Nick's they found Marty playing with some other boys.
sentences.chinese: 两人到达尼克修理厂时，发现马蒂正和其他男孩玩耍。

sentences.english: My car towed his car to a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我的车将他的车拖到了汽车修理厂。

sentences.english: His car is in such bad condition as to be repaired in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 他的车的车况太差，得去修理厂大修一下。

sentences.english: Garages never seemed to be open when the car broke down.
sentences.chinese: 车坏的时候，好象修理厂总是关着门。

sentences.english: I went to the garage and asked for my money back, but they refused.
sentences.chinese: 我去修理厂想把前要回来，却被他们拒绝了。

sentences.english: The dent on the wing of our car can be beaten out at the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们汽车挡泥板上的凹痕可以在汽车修理厂敲平。

sentences.english: And then removed the pump shaft shell removed send impeller repair shop repair.
sentences.chinese: 然后将轴拆出泵壳，拆下叶轮送修理厂修理。

sentences.english: Weber is working in a garage as a mechanician .
sentences.chinese: 韦伯在汽车修理厂作机械师。

sentences.english: A tractor towed the car to the repair factory.
sentences.chinese: 一辆牵引车将汽车拖去修理厂。

definition: traffic/to drive (i.e. travel in a vehicle)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
